NEW DOWNLOAD - 5 MINUTE GUIDE TO MODERN MARKETING IN 2017

New for 2017. This 5 Minute guide will give you a snapshot of the modern marketing techniques and tools that smaller businesses should adopt, in order to build and execute successful marketing campaigns in the software and technology B2B sectors.

What it covers:

  • Read more about NEW DOWNLOAD - 5 MINUTE GUIDE TO MODERN MARKETING IN 2017

2016, an eventful year...

An understatement granted, but 'eventful' is probably the best word to sum up 2016.

First there was the shock of the EU referendum result and the 'will they/won't they/nothing much has happened yet' ongoing Brexit situation.  This was then followed by the equally if not more surprising victory of Donald Trump in the US election.

These momentous events and their fall-out have caused much uncertainty globally, and the economic markets have been extremely volatile in their wake. But what positives can be learned from these, and how can it benefit small businesses?

  • Read more about 2016, an eventful year...

Are You Ready to do Business on a Mobile Device?

For the first time ever, Smartphones have overtaken PCs for online surfing. 

The seismic shift from PCs to mobile devices is upon us - the news is just out that for the first time viewing websites on mobile devices has overtaken desktop PCs (source Daily Telegraph, 2nd November 2016).

  • Read more about Are You Ready to do Business on a Mobile Device?

Want your best ever sales figures? Get help from a specialist

Sometimes you need to ask for help from an expert to achieve your goals. 

At Terry Forsey Consulting we offer a range of services to support smaller software businesses through their sales and marketing process.

Recently, a Lincoln-based company we have worked with, recorded their best-ever sales figures after spending time working with us.

  • Read more about Want your best ever sales figures? Get help from a specialist

Re-engineer Your Sales Resources for Dramatic Success...

The spotlight this summer is on sales. With effective marketing in place many people have reduced the resources needed to drive inbound enquiries and are focusing the sales engagement model on fewer more relevant leads. 

  • Read more about Re-engineer Your Sales Resources for Dramatic Success...

Get to Your Target Audience Before Your Competition Does...

Helping you get a head-start in the race to win sales and beat your competitors.

You need to be quick off the mark to stay ahead of the competition -  if you snooze you lose, as they say.  So make sure you leave the competition trailing in your wake by being the first to reach out to your target audience.

  • Read more about Get to Your Target Audience Before Your Competition Does...

Transform Your Software Business Today

Starting out or well established? How does this affect your sales and marketing success?

When you're starting out, you may well struggle with sales and marketing through lack of time and in-house resources.

Then as an established business, you may find that you've grown the business and attained a certain level but you can’t improve on that.  Your business growth has levelled off and you need a sales boost but don't know how to achieve that.

  • Read more about Transform Your Software Business Today

Successfully Marketing Your Software – helping Hark Solutions achieve their business aims and objectives.

Hark Solutions approached us with their latest software product aWorkbook. They wanted Terry Forsey Consulting to help them develop a sustainable and robust modern marketing process in order to strengthen their market position, engage with a wider audience and most importantly to generate more sales leads.

  • Read more about Successfully Marketing Your Software – helping Hark Solutions achieve their business aims and objectives.
